attributes.action: Give the British people freedom of speech as we deserve our voice to be heard
attributes.additional_details: To many of us feel that our voice isn’t heard and is censored, we’re afraid to speak our minds in case we are censored, fired from our jobs and even to the extreme extent of being jailed for using our god given gift of speech, there are way to many unheard voices we need to be able to speak freely and have no fear that it will have devastating consequences for something as little as a word. All the people are asking is to be able to speak freely without being afraid or censored.
attributes.background: We want you to give us freedom of speech, make it a law that the British community have the right to speak their mind freely without being censored and or jailed for saying words that we was taught throughout our lives.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
